products.name: Tomatoes

products.name: Peppers

events.name: Farmers' Market
events.description: Join us for a day of fresh produce, local artisans, and community fun!

events.name: Harvest Festival
events.description: Celebrate the harvest season with us! Enjoy live music, food, and games for all ages.

events.name: Farm-to-Table Dinner
events.description: Join us for a farm-to-table dinner featuring fresh produce from our farm and local chefs.

events.name: Farmers' Workshop
events.description: Learn the art of farming from our experienced farmers! Topics include soil preparation, crop rotation, and more.
